voice_instruct: A man in his late fifties with a deep, commanding baritone. The voice of a warlord who has become a statesman. Heavy with authority and regret in equal measure. Deliberate, unhurried, like a man who once burned cities and now builds covenants. Military precision in every syllable.

tracks.title: The Blackthorn
tracks.prompt: epic progressive rock, deep male vocals, heavy bass riff, complex time signatures, Tool meets King Crimson, D minor, 76 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
they gave me the name Blackthorn when I was still a boy with red on my hands
Gavilar had the vision, I had the violence, that was how it began
we unified Alethkar one principality at a time by the sword
and every highprince who refused to kneel was buried beneath his own accord

the Thrill would come like a second heartbeat, Nergaoul singing in my veins
a drumbeat underneath the battle, turning murder into champagne
I loved it, I will not pretend I did not love the red
I was the weapon and the wielder and I pointed where Gavilar said

[chorus]
I am the Blackthorn, I am the fist of Alethkar
I broke ten armies on the Shattered Plains before I broke the war
but every name I earned in glory is a name that someone cursed
and the Blackthorn's greatest victory was learning he was the worst

[verse 2]
the Codes of War, the old ones, Nohadon's forgotten discipline
I found them in a book that no one read and made them mine within
no drinking on duty, no fighting without purpose, no retreat without reason
the other highprinces called me mad, they called it treason

but the visions came in every highstorm, Honor speaking from beyond the grave
showing me the Radiants, showing me what Roshar could not save
and I realized the Blackthorn was not the answer, he was the problem
the weapon had to put itself away before it could solve them

[bridge]
unite them, the dead god keeps saying
unite them, as if I know how
I who divided every kingdom with a blade
am now supposed to teach them to bow

[chorus]
I am the Blackthorn, I am the fist of Alethkar
I broke ten armies on the Shattered Plains before I broke the war
but every name I earned in glory is a name that someone cursed
and the Blackthorn's greatest victory was learning he was the worst

tracks.title: The Rift
tracks.prompt: dark heavy prog rock, deep male vocals, distorted bass, fire-crackle textures, Porcupine Tree meets Mastodon, F minor, 72 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the city of Rathalas stood on the edge of a rift in the earth
Tanalan's rebellion, a boy I had spared once, now a man with a sword
Evi went to negotiate, my wife who hated every war I loved
she walked into the city with a white flag and a word

I did not wait, the Thrill was in me and the army was a tide
I gave the order and the oil went down and the fire went wide
the Rift became a furnace and the city became ash
and somewhere in the burning I heard something that I could not unlash

[chorus]
Evi, Evi, I burned the city with you in it
Evi, Evi, I heard your voice too late by a minute
the Rift took everything, the smoke took every prayer
and I stood on the edge of the fire and I did not even know you were there

[verse 2]
I carried her body from the rubble and the char
her face was gone, her hands were gone, I recognized the scar
the small one on her shoulder from the training yard in spring
and I held what was left of my wife and I could not feel anything

the Thrill receded like a tide that leaves the wreckage on the sand
and I looked at what I was, at what I held in my hand
the Blackthorn was not a hero, the Blackthorn was a fire
and everything he touched eventually became his pyre

[bridge]
I went to the Nightwatcher because I could not carry her face
I asked to forget, Cultivation listened, she took the weight
but she took more than grief, she took the memories of love
she pruned me like a plant and left the roots for something above

[chorus]
Evi, Evi, I burned the city with you in it
Evi, Evi, I heard your voice too late by a minute
the Rift took everything, the smoke took every prayer
and I stood on the edge of the fire and I did not even know you were there

tracks.title: Cultivation's Pruning
tracks.prompt: atmospheric prog rock, deep male vocals, clean arpeggios, Steven Wilson meets Opeth, Ab minor, 68 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I asked to have my pain removed, the Nightwatcher grinned
she offered me a boon and curse but Cultivation intervened
the old god took my memories, not just the grief but everything
my wife became a blur, her name became a missing string

[chorus]
Cultivation does not give you what you want
she gives you what you need to grow beyond the haunt
she pruned my memories like branches from a vine
and what grew back was not the man, but something more aligned

[verse 2]
the memories returned in pieces, in the worst possible order
first the love, then the burning, then the body at the border

[bridge]
Cultivation sees in seasons, not in days
she planted something in the grief, a seed inside the haze

[chorus]
Cultivation does not give you what you want
she gives you what you need to grow beyond the haunt
she pruned my memories like branches from a vine
and what grew back was not the man, but something more aligned

tracks.title: The Thrill
tracks.prompt: aggressive prog metal, deep male vocals, heavy riff, Mastodon meets Tool, E minor, 84 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Nergaoul, the Unmade, they never told us he was there
a spren of ancient hatred wrapped in battle's electric air
the Thrill is what we called it, the joy of combat, the red song

[chorus]
the Thrill, the Thrill, it tastes like copper and like fire
the Thrill, the Thrill, it lifts you up and pulls you higher
but the thing that makes you powerful is the thing that makes you blind
and every battle won by Thrill leaves something human behind

[verse 2]
I chased it for forty years, the Thrill was my religion
better than wine, better than love, better than any decision

[bridge]
the hardest battle was the morning when the Thrill was not there anymore
and I had to fight with only what I was, no chemical, no song

[chorus]
the Thrill, the Thrill, it tastes like copper and like fire
the Thrill, the Thrill, it lifts you up and pulls you higher
but the thing that makes you powerful is the thing that makes you blind
and every battle won by Thrill leaves something human behind

tracks.title: Oathbringer
tracks.prompt: epic atmospheric prog rock, deep male vocals, orchestral swells, Pink Floyd meets Porcupine Tree, D minor to D major, 78 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I am the man who burned Rathalas, that is the truth I owe
the memories came back and showed me everything below

[chorus]
the most important words a man can say are I will do better
not I am sorry, not I was wrong, not I will try
I will do better, that is the oath I hold together
I will do better until the day I die

[verse 2]
I wrote a book, I called it Oathbringer, for the Blade I gave away
I traded it to buy a bridgeman, Kaladin was worth the price

[bridge]
you cannot have my pain, I told Odium to his face
he offered to take the guilt, to make the memories erase
but I had earned that pain, I had paid for it in fire

[chorus]
the most important words a man can say are I will do better
not I am sorry, not I was wrong, not I will try
I will do better, that is the oath I hold together
I will do better until the day I die

tracks.title: Unite Them
tracks.prompt: building prog rock anthem, deep male vocals, Rush meets Porcupine Tree, G major, 80 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
unite them, the dead god said in every vision, every storm
unite the highprinces, unite the kingdoms, reform the form

[chorus]
unite them, not by force, not by fear, not by the Blade
unite them by the truth that none of us is self-made
unite them by the confession that the Blackthorn was a sin
unite them by the radical act of letting everyone in

[verse 2]
Azir and Thaylenah and Iri and the Makabaki states
I brought them to the table not as conqueror but as peer

[bridge]
Navani beside me, the woman who sees the science in the divine

[chorus]
unite them, not by force, not by fear, not by the Blade
unite them by the truth that none of us is self-made
unite them by the confession that the Blackthorn was a sin
unite them by the radical act of letting everyone in

tracks.title: You Cannot Have My Pain
tracks.prompt: intense dramatic prog rock, deep male vocals, Dream Theater meets Opeth, Bb minor, 82 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Odium came to me in the storm with a face like golden warmth
he said I understand you, Dalinar, I was there at the Rift

[chorus]
you cannot have my pain
you cannot have my guilt, you cannot have my grief
you cannot have my pain
it is mine, I forged it in the fire of my belief
you cannot have my pain
because the pain is what reminds me that the man inside was real
you cannot have my pain
and you will never understand why I refuse to kneel

[verse 2]
he screamed, the god of hatred screamed when I said no
I said the Words, the Third Ideal, I am Unity

[bridge]
the Perpendicularity opened at my feet
the realms collapsed together, Physical and Cognitive meet

[chorus]
you cannot have my pain
you cannot have my guilt, you cannot have my grief
you cannot have my pain
it is mine, I forged it in the fire of my belief

tracks.title: The Way of Kings
tracks.prompt: grand prog rock finale, deep male vocals, full band orchestral, Yes meets Genesis meets Pink Floyd, C major, 76 BPM
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Nohadon walked the path from Abamabar to Urithiru
a king who chose to walk when he could ride, who served when he could rule

[chorus]
a king is not the one who takes, a king is one who gives
a king is not the one who breaks, a king is one who lives
with the weight of every failure worn as openly as gold
the Way of Kings is not a crown, it is a hand to hold

[verse 2]
I gave away Oathbringer the Blade to save one bridgeman's life
my sons think I am changed, Adolin still sees the old man in my eyes
Renarin sees the future and it terrifies the skies

[bridge]
the Way of Kings is not a destination, it is the road
it is the moment when the Blackthorn puts the weapon down

[chorus]
a king is not the one who takes, a king is one who gives
a king is not the one who breaks, a king is one who lives
with the weight of every failure worn as openly as gold
the Way of Kings is not a crown, it is a hand to hold

[outro]
the highstorm breaks across the Shattered Plains
and in its wake, the old soldier walks on
not because the path is clear
but because walking is the point
